info.title: Rapleaf
info.description:
Rapleaf's Personlization API provides rich demographic data about email addresses in real-time.

You will need an Rapleaf API key in order to use this service.  You can get one (for free) here: https://www.rapleaf.com/developers/api_access.

With an API key, you will have free, unlimited access to age, gender, and city/state/country data.

Additionally, we provide many other premium fields for a small price.  Please visit our website or email us at info@rapleaf.com to get more info on pricing and our premium fields.

get.description:
Use the Rapleaf Personalization API to get demographic data tied to a specific email.  In addition, we will have a higher match rate if you provide one or more of the following:

First Name
Last Name
Street, City, State (all three)
Zip Code (with optional 4 digit extension)

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Rapleaf API key.  Get one for free here: https://dashboard.rapleaf.com/register

parameters.name: first
parameters.description: First name of individual. Not case sensitive.

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Last name of individual. Not case sensitive.

parameters.name: zip4
parameters.description: Zip Code (with optional 4 digit extension) for individual's residence.
